title: Edge AI
subtext: Bringing artificial intelligence to edge devices to process data locally
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Edge AI
texts: Edge AI refers to the deployment of artificial intelligence on edge devices, enabling data processing to occur locally rather than relying on cloud computing.
This approach reduces latency, enhances data privacy, and allows for real-time decision-making, making it ideal for applications such as autonomous vehicles, smart cameras, and IoT devices.
